original_text: But the Father will send the Holy Spirit to be with you. He will be your Helper. He will come in my name, and he will teach you all things. He will help you to remember everything that I have told you.
korean_text: 보혜사 곧 아버지께서 내 이름으로 보내실 성령 그가 너희에게 모든 것을 가르치고 내가 너희에게 말한 모든 것을 생각나게 하리라

sentences.original_text: But the Father will send the Holy Spirit
He will come in my name
and he will teach you all things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 너희에게 모든 것을 가르치실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will help you to remember
everything that I have told you
